tag_list: cyhite, zak, zachary, zachary-harding, cyhite-development, blasted-labs, cyhite-internet-services, g6-hosting
overview:
Zachary R. Harding is currently Chairmen and CEO of Cyhite, LLC, a leading software development firm and hosting company.

He founded Cyhite shortly after a brief adventure with H&H Technologies. After H&H’s short lived life Zak moved on to become the founder of Cyhite, LLC. After building Cyhite since he was 15 years old he has finally decided to delegate his duties. At the ripe age of 18 he has a net worth of 1.3b and owns a majority share in over 7 different companies.

He is currently working on 2 new businesses and investing into another.

In 2005 when he started Cyhite he had a vision of developing a better web. His vision grew from just minor development to Translation and security. The innovations by Cyhite have been lead by Zak since the day they opened. Not only developing software for clients but sponsoring OpenSource projects as well.
